name: Articuno ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Legendary Ascent
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Articuno ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may switch 1 of your Active Pokémon with Articuno ex. If you do, you may also move any number of basic {W} Energy cards attached to your Pokémon to Articuno ex.

attacks.name: Cold Crush
attacks.effect: You may discard an Energy card attached to Articuno ex. If you do, your opponent discards an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
